abstract: pub reaction; Cong comment; additional sums offered; V F Himmelwright offers reward for Chamberlain and Reynaud capture; P Bigelow comments
snippet: The proposal to "snatch" Adolf Hitler and deliver him for trial before the League of Nations, announced on Tuesday by Samuel Harden Church, president of the Carnegie Institute, in a letter to THE NEW YORK TIMES, stirred the imaginations of amateur...

headline.main: Hitler Reward Offer Gets Mixed Reception; 'Kidnappers' Start Plotting How to Seize Him; REWARD FOR HITLER APPROVED, DERIDED

lead_paragraph: The proposal to "snatch" Adolf Hitler and deliver him for trial before the League of Nations, announced on Tuesday by Samuel Harden Church, president of the Carnegie Institute, in a letter to THE NEW YORK TIMES, stirred the imaginations of amateur kidnappers ...
